The size and shape of SiO 4 tetrahedra in coesite-IV (Fig. 2) are comparable with those in coesite-III (Supplementary Fig. 1), although the tetrahedra in coesite-IV are more distorted in terms of the bond angle variance (BAV)
19 . Measured in squared degrees, BAV in coesite-IV is equal to ∼81, whereas it is below ∼63 in coesite-III.
